about_the_game:
Step into the eerie aftermath of a failed reactor in Abandoned Mode. The power plant is now a desolate ruin, and your team’s mission is to restore it to operational status while dealing with both environmental hazards and lurking threats. Engage in a fresh set of challenges as you attempt to reactivate and stabilize the plant, all while combating the encroaching danger.

Key Features:

  • Post-Apocalyptic Environment: Explore and restore the dilapidated Nova-6 plant.

  • Restoration Challenges: Solve unique puzzles and overcome obstacles to reactivate critical systems.

  • Increased Threats: Face new dangers and environmental hazards in the abandoned plant.

  • Strategic Planning: Develop strategies to restore the plant while managing limited resources and time.

Will you succeed in keeping the Nova-6 power plant operational in overcome the challenges ? Trust your team, stay alert, and prepare for intense cooperative gameplay in Core Containment.

content_descriptors.notes: This game features a realistic and tense atmosphere with horrifying elements. Player characters can die through various means, including radiation exposure or attacks from terrifying monsters. The game contains depictions of blood, dismemberment, and intense violence. Scary and unsettling creatures create a sense of dread and fear throughout the experience, making it unsuitable for younger or sensitive audiences.

Minimum:

  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: Core Containment is a cooperative game set in the Nova-6 nuclear power plant. Team up to prevent a meltdown while dealing with a hidden saboteur in Standard Mode. In Abandoned Mode, restore the desolate plant and tackle new challenges. Trust and strategy are crucial for survival.
